verses.verse: Concerning the Ammonites <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5983><s%>, thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; Hath Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> no sons <S%H1121><s%>? hath he no heir <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8802><s%>? why then doth their king <S%H4428><s%> inherit <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and his people <S%H5971><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in his cities <S%H5892><s%> ?

Therefore, behold, the days <S%H3117><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, that I will cause an alarm <S%H8643><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> to be heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8689><s%> in Rabbah <S%H7237><s%> of the Ammonites <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5983><s%>; and it shall be a desolate <S%H8077><s%> heap <S%H8510><s%>, and her daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall be burned <S%H3341><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>: then shall Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> be heir <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them that were his heirs <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Howl <S%H3213><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, O Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, for Ai <S%H5857><s%> is spoiled <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8795><s%>: cry <S%H6817><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, ye daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Rabbah <S%H7237><s%>, gird <S%H2296><s%> <S%H8798><s%> you with sackcloth <S%H8242><s%>; lament <S%H5594><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and run to and fro <S%H7751><s%> <S%H8708><s%> by the hedges <S%H1448><s%>; for their king <S%H4428><s%> shall go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into captivity <S%H1473><s%>, and his Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> and his princes <S%H8269><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.

Wherefore gloriest <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8691><s%> thou in the valleys <S%H6010><s%>, thy flowing <S%H2100><s%> <S%H8802><s%> valley <S%H6010><s%>, O backsliding <S%H7728><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%>? that trusted <S%H982><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in her treasures <S%H214><s%>, saying, Who shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me?

Behold, I will bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8688><s%> a fear <S%H6343><s%> upon thee, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, from all those that be about <S%H5439><s%> thee; and ye shall be driven out <S%H5080><s%> <S%H8738><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> right forth <S%H6440><s%>; and none shall gather up <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8764><s%> him that wandereth <S%H5074><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

And afterward <S%H310><s%> I will bring again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Concerning Edom <S%H123><s%>, thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>; Is wisdom <S%H2451><s%> no more in Teman <S%H8487><s%>? is counsel <S%H6098><s%> perished <S%H6><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from the prudent <S%H995><s%> <S%H8801><s%>? is their wisdom <S%H2451><s%> vanished <S%H5628><s%> <S%H8738><s%> ?

Flee <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye, turn back <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8717><s%>, dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> deep <S%H6009><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, O inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Dedan <S%H1719><s%>; for I will bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the calamity <S%H343><s%> of Esav <S%H6215><s%> upon him, the time <S%H6256><s%> that I will visit <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him.

If grapegatherers <S%H1219><s%> <S%H8802><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to thee, would they not leave <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8686><s%> some gleaning grapes <S%H5955><s%>? if thieves <S%H1590><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>, they will destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8689><s%> till they have enough <S%H1767><s%>.

But I have made Esav <S%H6215><s%> bare <S%H2834><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, I have uncovered <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8765><s%> his secret places <S%H4565><s%>, and he shall not be able <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to hide <S%H2247><s%> <S%H8736><s%> himself: his seed <S%H2233><s%> is spoiled <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8795><s%>, and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, and his neighbours <S%H7934><s%>, and he is not.

Leave <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thy fatherless children <S%H3490><s%>, I will preserve them alive <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8762><s%>; and let thy widows <S%H490><s%> trust <S%H982><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in me.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; Behold, they whose judgment <S%H4941><s%> was not to drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the cup <S%H3563><s%> have assuredly <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8800><s%> drunken <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; and art thou he that shall altogether <S%H5352><s%> <S%H8800><s%> go unpunished <S%H5352><s%> <S%H8735><s%>? thou shalt not go unpunished <S%H5352><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, but thou shalt surely <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8800><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of it.

For I have sworn <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> by myself, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, that Bozrah <S%H1224><s%> shall become a desolation <S%H8047><s%>, a reproach <S%H2781><s%>, a waste <S%H2721><s%>, and a curse <S%H7045><s%>; and all the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof shall be perpetual <S%H5769><s%> wastes <S%H2723><s%>.

I have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a rumour <S%H8052><s%> from the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and an ambassador <S%H6735><s%> is sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8803><s%> unto the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, saying, Gater ye together <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8690><s%>, and come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8798><s%> against her, and rise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to the battle <S%H4421><s%>.
For, lo, I will make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee small <S%H6996><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and despised <S%H959><s%> <S%H8803><s%> among men <S%H120><s%>.

Thy terribleness <S%H8606><s%> hath deceived <S%H5377><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee, and the pride <S%H2087><s%> of thine heart <S%H3820><s%>, O thou that dwellest <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the clefts <S%H2288><s%> of the rock <S%H5553><s%>, that holdest <S%H8610><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the height <S%H4791><s%> of the hill <S%H1389><s%>: though thou shouldest make thy nest <S%H7064><s%> as high <S%H1361><s%> <S%H8686><s%> as the eagle <S%H5404><s%>, I will bring thee down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8686><s%> from thence, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Also Edom <S%H123><s%> shall be a desolation <S%H8047><s%>: every one that goeth <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> by it shall be astonished <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and shall hiss <S%H8319><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at all the plagues <S%H4347><s%> thereof.

As in the overthrow <S%H4114><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%> and the neighbour <S%H7934><s%> cities thereof, saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, no man <S%H376><s%> shall abide <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there, neither shall a son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> dwell <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in it.

Behold, he shall come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> like a lion <S%H738><s%> from the swelling <S%H1347><s%> of Yarden <S%H3383><s%> against the habitation <S%H5116><s%> of the strong <S%H386><s%>: but I will suddenly <S%H7280><s%> <S%H8686><s%> make him run away <S%H7323><s%> <S%H8686><s%> from her: and who is a chosen <S%H977><s%> <S%H8803><s%> man, that I may appoint <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8799><s%> over her? for who is like me? and who will appoint me the time <S%H3259><s%> <S%H8686><s%>? and who is that shepherd <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> that will stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me?

Therefore hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, that he hath taken <S%H3289><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against Edom <S%H123><s%>; and his purposes <S%H4284><s%>, that he hath purposed <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Teman <S%H8487><s%>: Surely the least <S%H6810><s%> of the flock <S%H6629><s%> shall draw them out <S%H5498><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: surely he shall make their habitations <S%H5116><s%> desolate <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8686><s%> with them.

The earth <S%H776><s%> is moved <S%H7493><s%> <S%H8804><s%> at the noise <S%H6963><s%> of their fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, at the cry <S%H6818><s%> the noise <S%H6963><s%> thereof was heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8738><s%> in the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>.

Behold, he shall come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and fly <S%H1675><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as the eagle <S%H5404><s%>, and spread <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his wings <S%H3671><s%> over Bozrah <S%H1224><s%>: and at that day <S%H3117><s%> shall the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%> be as the heart <S%H3820><s%> of a woman <S%H802><s%> in her pangs <S%H6887><s%> <S%H8688><s%>.

Concerning Damascus <S%H1834><s%>. Hamath <S%H2574><s%> is confounded <S%H954><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and Arpad <S%H774><s%>: for they have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> tidings <S%H8052><s%>: they are fainthearted <S%H4127><s%> <S%H8738><s%>; there is sorrow <S%H1674><s%> on the sea <S%H3220><s%>; it cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> be quiet <S%H8252><s%> <S%H8687><s%>.

Damascus <S%H1834><s%> is waxed feeble <S%H7503><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and turneth <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8689><s%> herself to flee <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and fear <S%H7374><s%> hath seized <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8689><s%> on her: anguish <S%H6869><s%> and sorrows <S%H2256><s%> have taken <S%H270><s%> <S%H8804><s%> her, as a woman in travail <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.
How is the city <S%H5892><s%> of praise <S%H8416><s%> not left <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8795><s%>, the city <S%H7151><s%> of my joy <S%H4885><s%> !

Therefore her young men <S%H970><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in her streets <S%H7339><s%>, and all the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> shall be cut off <S%H1826><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>.

And I will kindle <S%H3341><s%> <S%H8689><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> in the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Damascus <S%H1834><s%>, and it shall consume <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the palaces <S%H759><s%> of Benhadad <S%H1130><s%>.

Concerning Kedar <S%H6938><s%>, and concerning the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of Hazor <S%H2674><s%>, which Nebuchadrezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> shall smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; Arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye, go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to Kedar <S%H6938><s%>, and spoil <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the men <S%H1121><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%>.

Their tents <S%H168><s%> and their flocks <S%H6629><s%> shall they take away <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: they shall take <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to themselves their parokhets <S%H3407><s%>, and all their vessels <S%H3627><s%>, and their camels <S%H1581><s%>; and they shall cry <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them, Fear <S%H4032><s%> is on every side <S%H5439><s%>.

Flee <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, get <S%H5110><s%> <S%H8798><s%> you far off <S%H3966><s%>, dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> deep <S%H6009><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, O ye inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Hazor <S%H2674><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; for Nebuchadrezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> hath taken counsel <S%H6098><s%> <S%H3289><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against you, and hath conceived <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a purpose <S%H4284><s%> against you.

Arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, get you up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto the wealthy <S%H7961><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%>, that dwelleth <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> without care <S%H983><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, which have neither gates <S%H1817><s%> nor bars <S%H1280><s%>, which dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8799><s%> alone <S%H910><s%>.

And their camels <S%H1581><s%> shall be a booty <S%H957><s%>, and the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of their cattle <S%H4735><s%> a spoil <S%H7998><s%>: and I will scatter <S%H2219><s%> <S%H8765><s%> into all winds <S%H7307><s%> them that are in the utmost <S%H7112><s%> <S%H8803><s%> corners <S%H6285><s%>; and I will bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> their calamity <S%H343><s%> from all sides <S%H5676><s%> thereof, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And Hazor <S%H2674><s%> shall be a dwelling <S%H4583><s%> for dragons <S%H8577><s%>, and a desolation <S%H8077><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>: there shall no man <S%H376><s%> abide <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there, nor any son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> dwell <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in it.

The word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> that came to Yirmeyah-yahu <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> against Elam <S%H5867><s%> in the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of the reign <S%H4438><s%> of TZidkiyah-yahu <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>; Behold, I will break <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the bow <S%H7198><s%> of Elam <S%H5867><s%>, the chief <S%H7225><s%> of their might <S%H1369><s%>.

And upon Elam <S%H5867><s%> will I bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the four <S%H702><s%> winds <S%H7307><s%> from the four <S%H702><s%> quarters <S%H7098><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and will scatter <S%H2219><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them toward all those winds <S%H7307><s%>; and there shall be no nation <S%H1471><s%> whither the outcasts <S%H5080><s%> <S%H8737><s%> of Elam <S%H5867><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H5769><s%> shall not come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

For I will cause Elam <S%H5867><s%> to be dismayed <S%H2865><s%> <S%H8689><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and before <S%H6440><s%> them that seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8764><s%> their life <S%H5315><s%>: and I will bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> upon them, even my fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; and I will send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them, till I have consumed <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8763><s%> them:

And I will set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my throne <S%H3678><s%> in Elam <S%H5867><s%>, and will destroy <S%H6><s%> <S%H8689><s%> from thence the king <S%H4428><s%> and the princes <S%H8269><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

But it shall come to pass in the latter <S%H319><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, that I will bring again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H7622><s%> of Elam <S%H5867><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
